case.name: Rafferty v Time 2000 West Pty Limited (No 2) [2008] FCA 1931 (17 December 2008)

citances.sentence: On 17 December 2008, I made an order that the application of the respondents for an order transferring this proceeding to the Victoria District Registry be refused. I further ordered that the costs of the respondents' notice of motion be reserved to the next directions hearing ( Rafferty v Time 2000 West Pty Ltd [2008] FCA 1925). On the same day, I decided that it was appropriate to make the freezing orders sought by the applicants ( Rafferty v Time 2000 West Pty Ltd (No 2) [2008] FCA 1931) and those orders were made on 19 December 2008.
